name: CherryBoy
description:
Genre: visual novel, adventures, mockery, drama, eroge

Cherry spent all his quiet life in the foliage of Parent Tree. One not so fine day humans came and took him and his brothers away from the Great Garden. What awaits Cherry there? How to return? Is it possible that Cherry won’t be able to, but will find new friends in a big world and maybe… love?

● You haven’t seen such “fruits” before!

● Would Cherry be able to survive in a big world? 3 main endings and numerous mini-endings.

● Colorful artwork and pleasant background music.

● Ever thought that girl’s interaction with fruits could be thrilling? Juicy CG won’t leave you indifferent.
